hero.description: A lightweight desktop mini player for Spotify. Built with Tauri + React, featuring OAuth authentication, multiple layouts, and a native feel.

features.sectionDescription: Everything you need for the perfect Spotify mini player experience

spotify.title: Spotify Integration
spotify.description: Seamless OAuth authentication with automatic token refresh and full playback control.

layouts.title: Multiple Layouts
layouts.description: Choose from three beautiful layouts (A, B, C) to match your workflow and style.

themes.title: Customizable Themes
themes.description: Switch between theme presets and customize colors to make MiniFy truly yours.

performance.title: Lightning Fast
performance.description: Built with Tauri and Rust for exceptional performance and minimal resource usage.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Tokens stored securely on disk with OAuth flow and no data collection.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Keyboard shortcuts, drag regions, and native context menus for full control.

download.sectionDescription: Get started with MiniFy for free. Available for Windows and Linux.

downloadPage.title: Download MiniFy
downloadPage.subtitle: Choose your platform and get started with the best Spotify mini player

linux.title: Linux
linux.description: For Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora and others (64-bit)

windows: Launch MiniFy and sign in with Spotify
macos: Open DMG and drag MiniFy to Applications

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: Check out our documentation or visit the GitHub repository for support.

opensource.title: Open Source & Community Driven
opensource.description: MiniFy is built in the open with contributions from developers worldwide. Join us in making it better!

footer.description: A lightweight Spotify mini player built with Tauri, React, and love for music.
